channel.title: Activity on cronocide.com
channel.description: Recent content in Activity on cronocide.com

item.title: Building a Tabletop Arcade Cabinet with RetroArch on RetroPi
item.description: Each year I get a crazy idea for a great gift for one of my family members. I do my best to get everyone in my family something they’ll like or appreciate, but usually there is one person that I think ‘Wow, this would be a great gift for them!’. This year it was my Dad. On a day that I got lost on the internet I found that there was such a thing as bartop arcade cabinet kits that take up a fraction of the space of normal arcade cabinets.

item.title: Saving an ESXi Datastore from a Foreign Config
item.description: My 3rd day of class started out with the unpleasant realization that my server was offline as of 4:30 this morning. I got the notice from my Uptime Robot who monitors the web server. I assumed that it was either a problem with my nginx frontend not starting automatically after a VM crash or a loss of internet to the house. Since I didn’t realize the problem until I was in class there wasn’t much I could do.
